content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5009.4 - Rights of a member with a date of membership on or after September 1, 1983 but before January 1, 2010, who has vested

State Regulations
(a) A member who has five or more years of
credited service on termination of employment shall be automatically vested and
shall be entitled to a deferred vested benefit at retirement age in accordance
with the provisions of sections
603
and
604
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. (b) In no event shall the
vested retirement allowance payable without optional modification be less than
the actuarial equivalent of the total which results from the member's
contributions accumulated with interest at five percent per annum compounded
annually to the date of retirement. Notes
